Sentence: When his (Prince) detested ex-wife's brother, Francis visits him (Prince) he (Prince) finds out that his (Prince) ex wife, Christian, has returned to London

During the confusion of her (Priscilla) suicide attempt, for which all of the Baffins and Francis Marloe are present, Christian, Bradley's ex-wife, appears, but is taken away by Arnold before Bradley sees her (ex-wife)
Priscilla starts staying at Christian's house so Francis Marloe, a former doctor, can care for her (Priscilla)
